 2003-11302003-07-24,  ,  HEALTH,  EC,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisORDER ADDING TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 which adds particulate matter containing metals released in emissions from copper smelters and for refineries and zinc plants to Schedule 1 to the Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0277 Publication Date: 2003-08-13
